BSG1-009.subtitle: Act Of Contrition
BSG1-009.abilityText: Target player reveals his or her hand. Choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
BSG1-009.flavorText: "Now, get up and walk out of this cabin while you still can." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-010.subtitle: Advanced Planning
BSG1-010.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [logistics] excess resources, you may play this card.) Look at the top five cards of your deck. Put one on top of your deck, and the other four on the bottom in any order.
BSG1-010.flavorText: "We'll have to Jump to another sector... start the search all over again. Needle in a haystack." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-011.subtitle: Angry
BSG1-011.abilityText: When you play this event, you may commit and exhaust target personnel you control. If you do, defeat target personnel.
BSG1-011.flavorText: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry." —Number Six

BSG1-012.subtitle: Bingo Fuel
BSG1-012.abilityText: Put target alert ship into its owner's hand.
BSG1-012.flavorText: "Roger, Apollo. Return to base." —PO 2nd Class Dualla

BSG1-014.subtitle: Channel The Lords Of Kobol
BSG1-014.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) The next time you would reveal a mystic value for a challenge this turn, do so twice and add those mystic values together.
BSG1-014.flavorText: "It's the right place. But we're not the first ones here." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-015.subtitle: Condition One
BSG1-015.flavorText: "Launch the alert fighters. Set Condition One throughout the fleet." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-016.subtitle: Condition Two
BSG1-016.flavorText: "I know what you mean. We'll go to Condition Two." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-017.subtitle: Crackdown
BSG1-017.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [security] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target opponent chooses and discards a card.

BSG1-018.subtitle: Cylon Computer Virus
BSG1-018.abilityText: All players discard their hands and then draw cards equal to their starting hand size.
BSG1-018.flavorText: "Cylon virus spawned in the subsystems before we broke the network." —Lt. Gaeta

BSG1-019.subtitle: Cylon Missile Battery
BSG1-019.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [logistics] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target Cylon unit gets +2 power.
BSG1-019.flavorText: DEFEATING THE CYLON MISSILE: 1) SEE IT! 2) Put it on your 3-9 line. 3) Countermeasures. 4) Turn Hard INTO it. 5) Pray. —Ready room whiteboard

BSG1-020.subtitle: Cylons Look Like Humans
BSG1-020.abilityText: All players put a card from the top of their decks into their discard piles for each Cylon unit or Cylon mission they control.
BSG1-020.flavorText: "The Cylons...have the ability to mimic the human form." —President Roslin

BSG1-021.subtitle: Decoys
BSG1-021.abilityText: When you play this event, you may commit any number of units you control. If you do, target unit gets +2 power for each unit you commit.
BSG1-021.flavorText: "We'll need three civilian freighters to use as decoys." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-022.subtitle: Dissension
BSG1-022.flavorText: "We've got fights breaking out on some ships over water rations." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-023.subtitle: Distraction
BSG1-023.abilityText: When you play this event, you may commit a personnel you control. If you do, commit and exhaust target unit.
BSG1-023.flavorText: "Miss Godfrey...I really should get back to...my duties." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-024.subtitle: Downed Pilot
BSG1-024.abilityText: Target opponent chooses one—Commit a ship that player controls; or sacrifice a personnel.
BSG1-024.flavorText: "Get to high ground. Then they see you. Then they rescue you." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-025.subtitle: Endless Task
BSG1-025.abilityText: Target player chooses one—Commit a unit he or she controls; or exhaust a unit he or she controls.
BSG1-025.flavorText: "Eleven hours to test each sample for Cylon indicators." —Dr. Baltar "That'll take a while." —Number Six

BSG1-026.subtitle: Executive Privilege
BSG1-026.abilityText: Prevent all influence loss this phase.

BSG1-027.subtitle: Fire Support
BSG1-027.abilityText: Target unit gets +2 power. (A unit is a personnel or ship.)

BSG1-028.subtitle: Fury
BSG1-028.abilityText: Target unit gets +X power, where X is that unit's mystic value. (A unit is a personnel or ship.)
BSG1-028.flavorText: "No. Sharon wouldn't give up without a much harder fight." —Number Six

BSG1-029.subtitle: Grounded
BSG1-029.abilityText: Target opponent chooses one—Commit a ship he or she controls; or commit all personnel he or she controls.

BSG1-030.subtitle: Hangar Deck Fire
BSG1-030.abilityText: Target opponent chooses one—Sacrifice a ship; or sacrifice a supply card.
BSG1-030.flavorText: "Attention: Fire on the Port Hangar Deck. Away the fire and rescue team. Fire on the Port Hangar Deck." —PO 2nd Class Dualla

BSG1-031.subtitle: High Stakes Game
BSG1-031.abilityText: All players reveal their hands. The players who have the most cards that have the highest mystic values each gain 2 influence.
BSG1-031.flavorText: "Thank you—thank you all for a most pleasant evening." —Dr. Baltar

BSG1-032.subtitle: Martial Law
BSG1-032.flavorText: "I have decided to dissolve the Quorum of Twelve, and as of this moment, I have declared martial law." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-033.subtitle: Military Coup
BSG1-033.abilityText: When you play this event, you may exhaust target personnel you control. If you do, exhaust target personnel an opponent controls.
BSG1-033.flavorText: "Miss Roslin, this is Colonel Tigh. No one needs to get hurt here." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-034.subtitle: Network Hacking
BSG1-034.abilityText: Each player chooses one—Commit a Cylon unit he or she controls; or commit all ships he or she controls.
BSG1-034.flavorText: "The Cylons are hacking our network." —Lt. Gaeta

BSG1-035.subtitle: Networked Computers
BSG1-035.abilityText: Each player reveals a mystic value. The player who has the highest mystic value chooses a card from his or her discard pile and puts that card into his or her hand. (If the mystic values are tied, reveal again.)

BSG1-037.subtitle: Painful Recovery
BSG1-037.abilityText: When you play this event, you may put target Cylon unit you control on top of its owner's deck. If you do, commit and exhaust target personnel.
BSG1-037.flavorText: "Tell me what's happening on my ship." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-038.subtitle: Power Of Prayer
BSG1-038.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Reveal a mystic value. Target unit gets +X power, where X is that mystic value.
BSG1-038.flavorText: "I knew you, of all people, wouldn't abandon me. Thank you, thank you." —Dr. Baltar

BSG1-039.subtitle: Presidential Candidate
BSG1-039.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target defending Politician gets +2 power.

BSG1-040.subtitle: Reformat
BSG1-040.abilityText: Discard X cards and then draw X cards.

BSG1-041.subtitle: Setback
BSG1-041.abilityText: Target player chooses one—Exhaust an alert unit he or she controls; or exhaust a reserve unit he or she controls.

BSG1-042.subtitle: Sick Bay
BSG1-042.abilityText: Put target alert personnel into its owner's hand.
BSG1-042.flavorText: "That was three G's, Starbuck. Not six. I'm sorry. I know it'll be tough, but you're staying home." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-043.subtitle: Sneak Attack
BSG1-043.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Commit all Fighters.
BSG1-043.flavorText: "Well, they found us. It was only a matter of time." —Col. Tigh

BSG1-044.subtitle: Standoff
BSG1-044.abilityText: Prevent all influence gain this phase.
BSG1-044.flavorText: "I get the feeling you don't really like the press, Commander." —D'Anna Biers

BSG1-045.subtitle: Still No Contact
BSG1-045.abilityText: Target opponent chooses one—Commit a personnel he or she controls; or sacrifice a personnel.
BSG1-045.flavorText: "So she survived the initial hits. She could still be alive." —Lt. Valerii

BSG1-046.subtitle: Stims
BSG1-046.abilityText: Target challenging Pilot gets +4 power. At the end of that challenge, exhaust that Pilot.
BSG1-046.flavorText: "I don't fly with stims. They blunt your reflexes, reaction time." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-047.subtitle: Stranded
BSG1-047.abilityText: Shuffle target reserve personnel into its owner's deck.
BSG1-047.flavorText: "On the bright side, it's a lovely day for a walk." —Lt. Thrace

BSG1-048.subtitle: Suicide Bomber
BSG1-048.abilityText: When you play this event, you may sacrifice a Cylon personnel. If you do, defeat two target personnel.
BSG1-048.flavorText: "A Cylon? Eyewitness accounts all state the bomber was a man." —Sgt. Hadrian

BSG1-049.subtitle: Test Of Faith
BSG1-049.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target player gains 1 influence.
BSG1-049.flavorText: "No, you won't. You'll complete the project. Just like I told you." —Number Six

BSG1-050.subtitle: Them Or Us
BSG1-050.abilityText: When you play this event, you may sacrifice a ship. If you do, defeat target personnel.
BSG1-050.flavorText: "Killing is killing, Madame President. The labels only matter to the living. The dead are just as dead." —Cmdr. Adama

BSG1-051.subtitle: Under Arrest
BSG1-051.abilityText: Put target personnel on top of its owner's deck.

BSG1-052.subtitle: Vision Of Serpents
BSG1-052.flavorText: "And unto the leader they gave a vision, of serpents numbering two and ten, as a sign of things to come." —Elosha

BSG1-053.subtitle: Winning Hand
BSG1-053.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target challenging personnel gets +2 power.
BSG1-053.flavorText: "Thirty to me, huh, Doc? Why not." —Capt. Adama

BSG1-054.subtitle: Wounded In Action
BSG1-054.abilityText: Target unit challenging you while you have no defender gets -2 power. (A unit is a ship or personnel.)
BSG1-054.flavorText: "She's not going to be walking, much less flying, anytime soon." —Dr. Cottle

BSG1-055.subtitle: You Gave Yourself Over
BSG1-055.abilityText: Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [persuasion] excess resources, you may play this card.) Target Civilian unit gets +2 power.

BSG2-007.subtitle: Anti-Radiation Dosage
BSG2-007.abilityText: Target unit can't be the target of effects that change its power.
BSG2-007.flavorText: "You been taking your radiation meds?" —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-008.subtitle: Boarding Party
BSG2-008.abilityText:
Target ship gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

Draw a card.
BSG2-008.flavorText: "We've got five Raptors with Marine fireteams standing by to board the Astral Queen." —Col. Saul Tigh

BSG2-009.subtitle: Concentrated Firepower
BSG2-009.abilityText: Target unit gets +X power, where X is the number of supply cards in target resource stack you control.

BSG2-010.subtitle: Covering Fire
BSG2-010.abilityText: Commit target unit you control: Target other unit gets +2 power.
BSG2-010.flavorText: "Don't see any shiny metal out there. Think we're dealing with the human variety." —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-011.subtitle: Crushing Reality
BSG2-011.flavorText:
"Look at the buildings." —President Laura Roslin

"Buildings?" —Billy Keikeya

BSG2-013.subtitle: Cylons On The Brain
BSG2-013.abilityText: Target personnel gains the Cylon trait until the end of the turn.

BSG2-014.subtitle: Determination
BSG2-014.flavorText: "Lords of Kobol, help me." —Lt. Kara "Starbuck" Thrace

BSG2-015.subtitle: Discourage Pursuit
BSG2-015.abilityText: Exhaust target defending personnel: It is not defeated if it loses the challenge. If the challenger wins, defeat the challenger.

BSG2-016.subtitle: Double Trouble
BSG2-016.abilityText: Take target singular Cylon personnel you control from its unit stack and put it into your reserve area.

BSG2-017.subtitle: Everyone's Green
BSG2-017.abilityText:
Target Cylon personnel without the Machine trait loses the Cylon trait.

Draw a card.
BSG2-017.flavorText: "If only they knew that everyone passes these days." —Number Six

BSG2-018.subtitle: Fallout Shelter
BSG2-018.abilityText: Target unit can't be the target of effects.

BSG2-019.subtitle: False Sense Of Security
BSG2-019.abilityText: The next time target opponent reveals a mystic value for a challenge this turn, he or she reveals an additional mystic value. You choose which mystic value he or she uses.

BSG2-020.subtitle: Full Disclosure
BSG2-020.abilityText: Each player reveals his or her hand.
BSG2-020.flavorText: "They look like us now." —President Laura Roslin

BSG2-021.subtitle: Full System Malfunction
BSG2-021.abilityText: Each player discards his or her hand.
BSG2-021.flavorText: "They said it was like someone just turned off a switch." —PO 2nd Class Anastasia "Dee" Dualla

BSG2-022.subtitle: Left Behind
BSG2-022.flavorText: "That little girl you saw today? Cami? Her ship can't make the jump." —Billy Keikeya

BSG2-023.subtitle: Lest We Forget
BSG2-023.abilityText:
Target unit gets +2 power when challenging a Cylon threat.

Draw a card.

BSG2-024.subtitle: Like a Ghost Town
BSG2-024.flavorText: "The ones who weren't killed outright probably ran into the hills. Won't do any good." —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-025.subtitle: Massive Assault
BSG2-025.abilityText: Ready all Capital Ships and Fighters.
BSG2-025.flavorText:
"With all respect, this is hardly the time to attack a superior force." —Col. Saul Tigh

"This is exactly the time." —Cmdr. William Adama

BSG2-026.subtitle: Out of Sight
BSG2-026.abilityText:
Target personnel gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

Draw a card.
BSG2-026.flavorText: "We gotta find another way." —Lt. Sharon "Boomer" Valerii

BSG2-027.subtitle: Raiding Farms
BSG2-027.abilityText: Defeat target asset that has no supply cards.
BSG2-027.flavorText: "If I have to die here, I'm gonna take out every one of those frakking 'farms' before I do." —Samuel Anders

BSG2-028.subtitle: Resupply
BSG2-028.abilityText: Draw X cards, where X is the number of supply cards in target unexhausted resource stack you control.

BSG2-029.subtitle: Showdown
BSG2-029.abilityText: Play this event only during the execution phase. No player can declare challenges.
BSG2-029.flavorText: "Kara, I think these guys might really be human." —Lt. Karl "Helo" Agathon

BSG2-030.subtitle: Site of Betrayal
BSG2-030.flavorText: "Humanity's children are returning home. Today." —Number Six

BSG2-031.subtitle: Special Delivery
BSG2-031.abilityText:
Target personnel gets +1 power and gains Scramble. (This unit can defend as a personnel or a ship.)

Draw a card.
BSG2-031.flavorText: "Mission accomplished! The Base Ship is history!" —Lt. Sharon "Boomer" Valerii

BSG2-032.subtitle: Spot Judgment
BSG2-032.abilityText: The next time you reveal a mystic value for a challenge this turn, reveal an additional mystic value and choose which you use.

BSG2-033.subtitle: Strafing Run
BSG2-033.abilityText:
Target ship gets +1 power and gains Strafe. (This unit can challenge as a personnel or a ship. Make this choice before the defender is chosen.)

Draw a card.

BSG2-034.subtitle: Strange Wingman
BSG2-034.abilityText: Target Fighter you control gets +X power, where X is the number of Cylon ships you control.

BSG2-035.subtitle: Swearing In
BSG2-035.flavorText: "I, Laura Roslin, do now avow and affirm . . ." —Laura Roslin

BSG2-036.subtitle: There Are Many Copies
BSG2-036.abilityText: Take target Cylon personnel card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.

BSG2-037.subtitle: This Tribunal Is Over
BSG2-037.flavorText: "This is my ship. I won't have a witch hunt." —Cmdr. William Adama

BSG2-039.subtitle: Top Off The Tank
BSG2-039.abilityText: Put this card beneath your base or an asset you control as a supply card. Don't put this card into your discard pile after its ability takes effect.

BSG2-040.subtitle: Treacherous Toaster
BSG2-040.abilityText:
Target Cylon threat gets +2 power.

Draw a card.

BSG2-041.subtitle: Unexpected...
BSG2-041.abilityText:
Expedite (When you pay a cost and have [security] excess resources, you can play this card.)

Target Cylon ship loses the Cylon trait until the end of the turn.

BSG2-042.subtitle: ...Sign
BSG2-042.abilityText: Play only during a challenge between two ships. The challenge ends, and both ships are committed.
BSG2-042.flavorText: "Galactica, repeat—Cylon Raider is marked 'Starbuck.'" —Capt. Lee "Apollo" Adama

BSG2-043.subtitle: Unwelcome Visitor
BSG2-043.abilityText: Target challenging Cylon personnel gets +4 power. When the challenge ends, defeat the target.

BSG2-044.subtitle: Vulnerable Supplies
BSG2-044.abilityText: Target opposing unit gets -X power, where X is the number of assets that have no supply cards that its controller controls.
